EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2018-12-05 Takeways on AWS ReInvent.ES-20181119-Invite Send 3.Subject Line T
EmailTemplate.subject: Hello from AWS re:Invent
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-aws-reinvent-takeaways/]]>
Register to Enter to Win $100 Amazon Gift Card <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-aws-reinvent-takeaways/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, I'm here at re:Invent, presenting on cloud elasticity, paneling on multi-cloud, and meeting with end-users to discuss how they leverage and benefit from AWS. Throughout the week I will be putting together key highlights from new product announcements, roadmap updates, and break-out presentations so I can share everything with those of you who aren't able to join me in Las Vegas.
Register Now <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-aws-reinvent-takeaways/]]>
Join my 30-minute live webinar on Wednesday, December 5th at 11 a.m. E.T. <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-aws-reinvent-takeaways/]]>, and we'll discuss the top 5 takeaways from re:Invent and how they may impact you and your team in 2019. See you then! Regards, Eric
PS. If you can't attend live sign up anyway, <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-aws-reinvent-takeaways/]]>and I'll send you the recording afterward.
